mapper.select: SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN TYPE IN ('일반적립', '일반환불', '긴급적립', '긴급환불') THEN POINT WHEN TYPE IN ('일반차감', '긴급차감') THEN -POINT ELSE 0 END ) AS TOTAL_POINT FROM TOTAL_POINT_VIEW WHERE PAR_BACKUP_ID = #{par_backup_id}

SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN TYPE IN ('일반적립', '일반환불', '긴급적립', '긴급환불') THEN POINT WHEN TYPE IN ('일반차감', '긴급차감') THEN -POINT ELSE 0 END ) AS TOTAL_POINT FROM TOTAL_POINT_VIEW WHERE PAR_BACKUP_ID = #{par_backup_id} AND CHANGED_DATE < #{date};
